code: import React from'react';import{useStore}from'../context/StoreContext';import ProductCard from'./ProductCard';import{categories}from'../data/products';import'./ProductList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const{products,selectedCategory,setSelectedCategory,searchTerm}=useStore();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product-list-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filter-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"filter-title",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Filter by Category"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"category-buttons",children:categories.map(category=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"category-btn ".concat(selectedCategory===category?'active':''),onClick:()=>setSelectedCategory(category),children:category},category))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"results-info",children:[searchTerm&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"search-info",children:["Showing results for \"",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:searchTerm}),"\""]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"count-info",children:[products.length," product",products.length!==1?'s':''," found",selectedCategory!=='All'&&" in ".concat(selectedCategory)]})]}),products.length>0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"products-grid",children:products.map(product=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ProductCard,{product:product},product.id))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"no-results",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"no-results-icon",children:"\uD83D\uDD0D"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"No products found"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Try adjusting your search or filter criteria"})]})]});};export default ProductList;
